summary: This is an email from the AT&T Court Appearance Team to an unspecified recipient regarding an upcoming witness appearance in the case USA v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The email offers to schedule a preparation call with a witness located in Suffern, NY, prior to their court appearance.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the defendant in the criminal case USA v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 CR 330 (AJN)).

events.title: Email regarding witness preparation
events.description: AT&T Court Appearance Team sends an email offering to schedule a prep call with a witness for an upcoming appearance in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

locations: 11760 US HWY 1, Suite 300, North Palm Beach FL 33408
keyFacts: The document is an email from the AT&T Court Appearance Team concerning the case USA v. Ghislaine Maxwell (docket 20 CR 330 (AJN)).
A witness for the case is located in Suffern, New York.
The email offers to arrange a preparation call with the witness prior to their court appearance.
The correspondence is dated November 19, 2021, during Maxwell's trial proceedings.
The AT&T legal team's contact information is based in North Palm Beach, Florida.
